response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, worth $800,000 to you. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000, which represents a remarkable saving of $50,000 compared to its market value. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a highly competitive price. We believe this offer will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
